additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Sow Stall Free Australian Pork Silverside (85%), Water, Cure [Mineral Salts (451, 450), Sugar, Salt, Antioxidant (316), Dextrose, Preservative (250)], Salt, Seasoning [Spices (Pepper, Coriander, Pimento, Cloves), Dehydrated Red Capsicum, Bayleaf, Juniper Berry Oil], Acidity Regulators [262, 325], Sugar, Yeast Extract, Natural Flavourings [Nutmeg, Mace, Caraway, Pepper, Garlic], Wood Smoke.

description: Cured pork silverside portion with a rich sweet Victorian mountain ash wood smoke, coated in a juniper seasoning with Christmas spices and cracked pepper.
name: Christmas Juniper Seasoned Ham
